entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
